name: Hot Crab Rounds
author: sal
summary: Toasted crabmeat rounds with melted mozzarella will drive you into feeding frenzy!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked
⅓ cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
1  French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together crabmeat, creamy salad dressing, Worcestershire sauce, cocktail sauce, celery and pickle relish
Arrange French baguette slices on a medium baking sheet in a single layer
Broil until lightly toasted, 2 to 5 minutes, in the preheated broiler
Spread even amounts of the crabmeat mixture on the toasted baguette slices
Broil in the preheated oven 15 minutes, or until cheese is melted and lightly browned
